scripts.build:wasm: emcc -Oz ../target/wasm32-unknown-emscripten/release/libegraph_c_api.a -o egraph.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=@exported_functions.json -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s MODULARIZE=1 -s TOTAL_MEMORY=268435456
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:wasm
